articles.title: Missing American Sailing Couple in Caribbean Is 'Presumed' Dead: Police - PEOPLE
articles.description: Three men who allegedly escaped jail in Grenada and hijacked the couple’s yacht to sail to St. Vincent have each pleaded guilty to four immigration-related charges.
articles.content: An American couple who'd been sailing in the Caribbean and have been missing for more than a week are presumed dead, though their bodies have not been recovered, authorities said in a Monday press co… [+4312 chars]

articles.title: 'Horizon: An American Saga' Trailer Charts Fight For Control Of Nation's Destiny - Deadline
articles.description: 'Horizon: An American Saga's first trailer teases a fight for control of the "last great open spaces" in the USA, over the course of the Civil War.
